summary: July 9 is the 190th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
For politician from Jharkhand of Similar Name , see Sanjiv Kumar.
Sanjeev Kumar  9 July 1938 - 6 November 1985 was a noted Indian film actor. He won several major awards including two National Film Awards for Best Actor for his performances in the movies Dastak  and Koshish . He acted in genres ranging from romantic drama to thrillers. Unlike his peers, Sanjeev Kumar did not mind playing roles that were non-glamorous, such as characters way beyond his age. Movies like Sholay and Trishul exemplify his talents. He is well remembered for his versatility and genuine portrayal of his characters.
title: Sanjeev Kumar
